main event: An unidentified observer reported seeing a small propeller-driven object in Dayton, Ohio on July 8, 1968.
interesting points: The observer noted that the object had the appearance of a grey color similar to a black propeller in front., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The object was described as flat and about the size of a station wagon., Another witness was present in the car during the sighting., No physical evidence was left by the phenomenon.
witness description: the observer and another person in the car
